newOpenSplash: Open the app with the newly opened welcome message
showFirstTimeOptions: Show the options available to the user upon opening the app
alreadyOpenedSplash: Open the app again, display options
home/:isDrawerOpen: Actions availabile from the home view
createWalletConfirmation: Modal view for creating new wallets
importWalletFromQRConfirmation: Confirm that the user wants to import a wallet
queryQRCodeForBalance: Use the camera to check an arbitrary wallet on the network
addContactStart: First view shown when adding a contact
sendMoneyStart: First view shown when sending money
sendMoneyDestinationKnown/:toWalletID: After selecting destination wallet, choose origin wallet
sendMoneyConfirmation/:fromWalletID/:toW: After selecting source and destination wallets, make payment
showContactsWithWallets: Show list of rendered contacts with their QR codes
walletFocusView/:walletID: Show information held by LSDB about wallet, takes data when called
